name: nocturia
content:
Add to word list
Add to word list
a condition that makes someone often need to urinate (= pass urine from the body) during the night: Nocturia can have a negative impact on several aspects of a person's quality of life. People with an overactive bladder can experience nocturia, which means they need to get up frequently at night to go to the bathroom.
More examplesFewer examplesFurther questioning elicited a history of nocturia.Nocturia is generally of mild degree and never reaches the levels experienced by most patients with true interstitial cystitis.His urine stream is intermittent, and he has recently begun experiencing nocturia and profound urinary urgency.
